summary: This mod adds a Lannisters shield from TV series Game of Thrones.
descriptionHtml:
[youtube]ZKgoUOo0pZI[/youtube] [youtube]dY68wYcMtLM[/youtube]

[youtube]iy8GCA5Inn0[/youtube]


[img]http://www.fantasyobchod.cz/images/E1020917_2_01.jpg[/img]

=============================================================================================================================
===================================================== Lannisters Shield 1 ===================================================
=============================================================================================================================


This mod adds a Lannisters shield from TV series Game of Thrones.

I decide to do this shield simply because i like GOT and everything about it and because i like using shields in Skyrim.
I did this model from scratch but main texture i obviously found on internet.


It have similar stats as imperial light shield but i decide to change recipe a bit.
You can craft it under imperial section. ("Steel Smithing" perk)


You will need:


- 6 firewoods
- 2 leathers
- 1 iron ingot ingot


- Lannisters Shield 1 is light shield

=============================================================================================================================
===================================================== Lannisters Shield 2 ===================================================
=============================================================================================================================


This mod adds a Lannisters shield based on TV series Game of Thrones.

However there is no such shield in TV series GoT so i was using my imagination to decide how it should looks like.
Obviously all emblems i found on internet and i am not author of any family emblem or any other emblems from TV series GoT.
I have to mention this because there are allways some pople acting as a nerds :D


Lannisters Shield 2 have similar stats as orcish shield but i decide to change recipe.
You can craft it under imperial section but you will need "Advanced Armors" perk.


You will need:


- 3 corundum ingots
- 2 golden ingot
- 1 steel ingots
- 2 leather strips


- Lannisters Shield 2 is heavy shield




==============================================================================================================================
==============================================================================================================================

I AM ABOUT TO CHANGE THOSE STATS AND VALUES IF PLAYERS DONT LIKE IT. THAT'S WHY I APPRECIATE YOUR FEEDBAC/OPINIONS/SUGGESTIONS

==============================================================================================================================
==============================================================================================================================





====================================================== Install ==============================================================


To install:

- Unpack and place one or both folders named Data into Skyrim's main folder ( C:\....\The Elder Scrolls V Skyrim\ ).
- You can see what is what on screenshots


==============================================================================================================================



Please feel free to share your opinion. Any feedback and suggestions are appreciated.


-zajkoajko-
